tool_description: Find all hotels, view prices, photos of the hotels, reviews. Find car rental deals. **Site:** booking.com **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters
name: Booking com
title: Booking com

required_parameters.name: adults_number_by_rooms
required_parameters.description: The number of adults in each room. Specify the number of adults separated by commas, for example: `3,1` Means that the first room will accommodate three adults, and the second room will accommodate 1 adult. If you are looking for just one room for two adults, please specify `2`

optional_parameters.name: children_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year

optional_parameters.name: children_number_by_rooms
optional_parameters.description: The number of children in each room. Specify the number of children separated by commas, for example: `3,1` Means that the first room will accommodate three children, and the second room will accommodate 1 children

optional_parameters.name: include_adjacency
optional_parameters.description: Include nearby places. If there are few hotels in the selected location, nearby locations will be added. You should pay attention to the `primary_count` parameter - it is the number of hotels from the beginning of the array that matches the strict filter.

api_list.name: Search hotels
api_list.description:
Get available hotels by the filter. Indicate the `destination_id` and `dest_type` -> use **@Search locations** endpoint, check-in and check-out date, number of adults and children. For possible filters use **@Filters for search** endpoint. Use `page_number` to paginate and navigate through the result pages!
Comparable to: ![Search locations](https://i.imgur.com/PCuK81r.png)

required_parameters.name: dest_id
required_parameters.description: Destination id, use `Search locations` to find a place, field `dest_id` and `dest_type`

optional_parameters.name: children_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year

optional_parameters.name: categories_filter_ids
optional_parameters.description: Search filter IDs. For possible filters use `@Filters for search`

optional_parameters.name: include_adjacency
optional_parameters.description: Include nearby places. If there are few hotels in the selected location, nearby locations will be added. You should pay attention to the `primary_count` parameter - it is the number of hotels from the beginning of the array that matches the strict filter.

api_list.name: List of Payment types
api_list.description: Returns a list of payments. Only payments with {bookable} set to 1, can be used in processBooking. For processBooking, we always support Visa, Mastercard and American Express.

api_list.name: List of Cities
api_list.description: Returns a list of cities where Booking.com offers hotels. location: Latitude and longitude. timezone: Timezone of the city.

api_list.name: Hotels Search
api_list.description:
Get available hotels by the filter. Indicate the `destination_id` and `dest_type` -> use **@Search locations** endpoint, check-in and check-out date, number of adults and children. For possible filters use **@Filters for search** endpoint. Use `page_number` to paginate and navigate through the result pages!
Comparable to: ![Search locations](https://i.imgur.com/PCuK81r.png)

required_parameters.name: dest_id
required_parameters.description: Destination id, use `Search locations` to find a place, field `dest_id` and `dest_type`

optional_parameters.name: include_adjacency
optional_parameters.description: Include nearby places. If there are few hotels in the selected location, nearby locations will be added. You should pay attention to the `primary_count` parameter - it is the number of hotels from the beginning of the array that matches the strict filter.

optional_parameters.name: children_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year

optional_parameters.name: categories_filter_ids
optional_parameters.description: Search filter IDs. For possible filters use `@Filters for search` ex: `price::USD-140-190`, or `price::USD-150-min` or `price::USD-150-max`

api_list.name: Meta Properties description
api_list.description: Get meta properties description
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://booking-com.p.rapidapi.com/v2/hotels/meta-properties"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "booking-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://booking-com.p.rapidapi.com/v2/hotels/meta-properties"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "booking-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Filters for search
api_list.description: Get a list of available filters for hotel search

required_parameters.name: dest_id
required_parameters.description: Destination id, use `Search locations` to find a place, field `dest_id` and `dest_type`

optional_parameters.name: include_adjacency
optional_parameters.description: Include nearby places. If there are few hotels in the selected location, nearby locations will be added. You should pay attention to the `primary_count` parameter - it is the number of hotels from the beginning of the array that matches the strict filter.

optional_parameters.name: categories_filter_ids
optional_parameters.description: Search filter IDs. For possible filters use `@Filters for search` ex: `price::USD-140-190`, or `price::USD-150-min` or `price::USD-150-max`

optional_parameters.name: children_ages
optional_parameters.description: The age of every child. If children will be staying in the room, please indicate their ages separated by commas. 0-less than a year

api_list.name: Description of the hotel
api_list.description: Get description of the hotel by hotel_id

api_list.name: flights/multi-city
api_list.description: Get flights multi-city

optional_parameters.name: infant_age
optional_parameters.description:
The `infant_age `must be a number(0, 1) and separated by commas
Ex: 0,1

optional_parameters.name: children_age
optional_parameters.description:
The `children_age `must be a number and separated by commas
Ex:  9,2,16

optional_parameters.name: airlines
optional_parameters.description:
airlines comma-separated or empty for all types
Get from this API
resultSetMetaData->marketingCarriers[index]->code
Ex: SK,BT
